title: Why Comedy is More Important Than EVER! | Steven Crowder, Nick Di Paolo, and Dave Landau
description:
#trump #humor #cancelculture
Steven is joined for an Ash Wednesday with Nick Di Paolo and Dave Landau for cigars and drinks where they talk cancel culture in comedy, what the real litmus test is for comedians, and how the culture is shifting hard left where humor is illegal.
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
